overview: It deals with Mahmud, a tycoon sawmill married a widow with one son, Zubaidah worked as a restaurant entrepreneur. Baharum, Zubaidah son befriends Mahmud adopted daughter Mira since childhood. As adults, their relationship grew stronger and they loved each other. Maher, a biological child relationship of Mahmud did not think much of it because he feared his father's estate will fall into the hands of both of them.
title: Senja Merah
